open.title: Frogfoot Outage | Benoni
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Frogfoot network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Frogfoot and Afrihost have been actively working to resolve the issue. Changes have been made and we are currently monitoring to confirm resolution of the issue.
Technicians are still working to restore services as soon as possible.
